name: Portable Home and Travel Handheld Fabric Steamer

content.description: Portable Home and Travel Handheld Fabric Steamer:  Fabric steamer with cleaner  Features a rubberized design with on/off switch  Fast heating with attachments  Disinfects, deodorizes, and steams  Visible water reservoir with max level  Ergonomic grip handle with wide steam nozzle  Ideal for drapery, bedding upholstery, delicate fabrics and regular garments  Emits 700 watts of continuous steam  Lint remover, fabric brush and a measuring spout included    Measurements:   Water reservoir 11 oz.  This product is manufactured in compliance with U.S. standards. If product is to be used outside of the U.S., use only with the appropriate outlet adapter and voltage converter for your country. Do not plug into an electrical outlet higher than 110-120V as this could result in fire and/or injury.
